ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Dispelling...
ygData.msgSnippet: I have trouble remembering, myself.  The Anti-Magic Aura strips the first buff in the list.  The Disenchanting Melody strips buffs at random from all party
ygData.messageBody:
I have trouble remembering, myself. The Anti-Magic Aura strips the first buff in the list. The
Disenchanting Melody strips buffs at random from all party members. I don't know whether different buffs
have different counters, or whether resists play a part, but the Melody doesn't always strip a buff on
every pulse.

I use the Melody to strip party members of buffs prior to Dragon buffing. It saves the Clerics a lot of
work and some mana.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 55 songs, Innoruuk



Windleaf Mistsong wrote:

> With Alenia's Disenchanting Melody, yes, we've been able to remove buffs on
> ourselves. I don't think it removes all buffs, but I do know it strips
> cleric and druid buffs as well as some DOT's. Be careful too, since
> Alenia's affects the whole group, that you don't wipe everyone's buffs off.
> I don't use this song all that often, if anything, I usually want
> Syvelian's Anti-Magic Aura to debuff a mob. But after a while I forget
> which one is which. You'd think I'd have it down by now since Alenia's
> requires a string instrument.
>
> ---Windleaf
